channel.title: Technology Stocks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Stocks on FinanClub

item.title: DELL
item.description: score:-84 Chances: Dell Technologies has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. The company has strong AI-led operations, but a very weak balance sheet. Dell, Broadcom, and Oracle are all solid blue-chip income stocks.

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:142 Chances: SoundHound AI Inc. (NASDAQ: SOUN) reported substantial year-over-year gains in its recent financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2023. The company announced an innovative in-vehicle voice assistant using a large language model completely on the edge while running on the NVIDIA DRIVE platform, showcasing technological advancements.
